timeline.message:
Removed hard coded version from HttpConstants.
Added azure-cosmos.properties file.
Added unit tests to verify current version

timeline.bodyText:
ideally you can use xml parser to get the path of the filed of interest
anyway, not a big deal for a test and may not worth the time.
Thank you.
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, didn't want to add extra dependency :)
but yes, I agree. We could use that.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: This is cool. We do additional regex testing to test over the version format.
timeline.author: sima-zhu
